title: Silent legacy (A)
creator_credit: Reel Images, NIMAA, ATSIC, ScreenWest, Brian Beaton and Debbie Gittens
brief_description: The filmmaker’s personal narrative of her father’s experience as one of the stolen generation and his search for identity as an adult. Harry Carmody was taken from his mother’s arms to live a white life at the Church of Christ’s Norsman Mission an event that continues to have far-reaching consequences for his family.
